titleStmt.title: The west=country wooing: or, The merry conceited couple. In pleasant tearms [sic] he lets her know his mind ... To the tune of, When Sol will cast no light: or, My pretty little rogue.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
